reviews.review_msg: He tries to be funny but he is not. I am sorry for any place in which Anoop is a comedian...

He is definitely passionate about what he is teaching; however, only take his course if he is your supervisor. The lectures leave you in a confusing state just because the course is normally filled with his grad students from his lab and he does not care enough for the people who take the class without having previous exposure to the subject.
